meanings.sent1: The lehua blooms beautifully in the forest.
meanings.sent2: I picked a lehua to put in a vase at home.
meanings.sent3: The lehua flower danced in the gentle breeze.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as a lehua in full bloom.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant red color of the lehua stood out among the green leaves.

meanings.definition: The name of a specific species of tree native to Hawaii.
meanings.sent1: The lehua tree provides shade on hot days.
meanings.sent2: We sat under the lehua and enjoyed a picnic.
meanings.sent3: The lehua tree whispered secrets to the wind.
meanings.sent4: His roots ran deep like a lehua tree in the mountains.
meanings.sent5: The branches of the lehua reached towards the sky, reaching for the sun.
